participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Emily is optimistic and passionate about music. She tends to express her emotions openly and loves to connect with others through shared interests.
participant_1.background: i recently was fired and had to get a new job. i work in the insurance business. my mom passed away when i was young. my father is in the army.

participant_2.name: Jacob Smith
participant_2.personality: Jacob is laid-back and enjoys a variety of music genres. He has a friendly demeanor and is always up for a casual conversation about personal interests.
participant_2.background: i drive a nissan pathfinder. i met taylor swift. my favourite music is country music. i'm a convenience store manager.
